skins.shipDescription: An Shan-class destroyer No.2 - Fu Shun (102)
skins.selfIntroduction: The name's Fu Shun, second ship of the An Shan-class destroyers and one of the first-generation "Four Unbreakables." Rezkiy? That was my birth name. Even though I accomplished a lot, I unfortunately never experienced actual combat. The closest I got was that one time, when An Shan and I almost opened fire! Anyway, please let me fight to my heart's content on the battlefield!
skins.acquisition: Destroyer Fu Shun, reporting in! Uhh... where's Chang Chun? She was clearly behind me just a minute ago...
skins.login: Today's Fu Shun is all fired up and ready to go!
skins.details: Commander, if there's something you want to find out, I'd be glad to investigate with you~
skins.secretaryIdle1: If I give this to Tai Yuan, I'm sure she will be very happy!
skins.secretaryIdle2: A ghost ship that emerges from the frozen waters of the Arctic at midnight? Certainly, I've heard this rumor before.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Although Chang Chun is my younger sister, she has taught me a lot!
skins.secretaryTouch: Woah! Um... I just happened to be, uh, scratching my back! Yeah, I'm definitely not hiding anything!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Woah! Commander, are you frisking me? I'm not hiding anything!
